content.text: MainActivity.java: Or SplashActivity, the startup/welcome screen.
UpdateProfileActivity.java: Handles user profile update logic.
CourseListActivity.java: Displays the list of courses and handles enrollment logic.
PersonalScheduleActivity.java: Displays the personal study schedule.
AdminAccountManagementActivity.java: Handles user account management logic (Admin).
ContentCreationActivity.java: Handles lecture/quiz content creation logic (Teacher).
HomeActivity.java: The main screen after login (can have multiple versions depending on the user role).
